languages.text:
"Зов Всеотца призвал их на битву,
Двоих против зверя".

"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."
languages.original_text:
"Зов Всеотца призвал их на битву,
Двоих против зверя".

traits.locale_text:
"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

"Зов Всеотца призвал их на битву,
Двоих против зверя".

"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

languages.text:
「全知の父の呼びかけにより
獣と戦うためにふたりが召喚された」
languages.original_text:
"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

traits.locale_text:
「全知の父の呼びかけにより
獣と戦うためにふたりが召喚された」

languages.text:
“全父召唤二人，
与野兽拼死一战。”
languages.original_text:
"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

traits.locale_text:
“全父召唤二人，
与野兽拼死一战。”

languages.text:
« L'appel du Père de Tous fut entendu
par deux âmes prêtes à affronter la bête. »
languages.original_text:
"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

traits.locale_text:
« L'appel du Père de Tous fut entendu
par deux âmes prêtes à affronter la bête. »

languages.text:
«A dos convocó la llamada del Padre
para doblegar a la bestia o caer».
languages.original_text:
"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

traits.locale_text:
«A dos convocó la llamada del Padre
para doblegar a la bestia o caer».

languages.text:
"Der Ruf des Allvaters rief zwei
in den Kampf gegen das Ungeheuer."
languages.original_text:
"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

traits.locale_text:
"Der Ruf des Allvaters rief zwei
in den Kampf gegen das Ungeheuer."

languages.text:
"Duydular Yücebaba'nın çağrısını;
İki yiğit, canavara karşı koydular."
languages.original_text:
"The Allfather's call two summoned
to battle against the beast."

traits.locale_text:
"Canavara karşı savaşmak için
Yücebaba'dan yardım istediler."
